name: Igor V.
intro: My experience in digital technology is more than 5 years. Focused on creating products that make people's lives better. I also create content in the form of blogs and themes. I love to learn new things and am always open to learning new technologies.
about: I'm a Full-Stack developer who loves creating beautiful websites. I've been coding for more than 5 years and enjoy every part of my journey. I use web technologies like PHP/Laravel/Node.JS (Backend) and Next.js/React/Redux/Vue (Frontend) in my projects. As a database, I have experience with MySQL/MariaDB, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.

projects.name: ZOHO CRM
projects.about: Synchronization of products, categories, orders, and contacts. Synchronization between two CRM systems, ZOHO CRM and Clarizen CRM.

projects.name: Shopify For ZOHO CRM
projects.about: Synchronization of products, categories, orders and contacts between Shopify store and ZOHO CRM. For this solution was created an extension for Marketplace with synchronization settings. Frontend is made on Vue.js. Backend on Laravel.

testimonials.value: Igor was easy to work with, skilled, diligent, and communicated well. We will continue to work with him
testimonials.name: Kevin Glassman

testimonials.value: I have collaborated with Igor many times and plan to continue. Responsible executor, he always meets deadlines.
testimonials.name: Sergey P
